explanation: [0-0] On a sunny day, Steve is standing next to a small sapling. In the pool below the screen is a mermaid, Alex. Beside the pool is a water pipe with a faucet and an empty bucket at the end. Steve is bending over, looking at the sapling.

[0-8] Steve nods, then runs to the faucet, fills a bucket with water. The water level in the pool below decreases, then the screen switches to Alex the mermaid looking up in surprise at the water level. Steve then pours the water from the bucket onto the sapling. The sapling grows larger.
